data.title: Masculin – FACE Foundation
data.text:
A play on the 1966 Godard film title Masculin Feminin, “Masculin / Masculin” presented a gamut of colorful male figures in French film—lovers, heroes, gangsters, and rebels. From love to war, and from neuroses to humor, the 2014 festival offered the most memorable of the masculin in classic love stories, thrilling film noir, and deadpan French comedies.

Check out this article by Adriana Stephan: 10 Reasons You Should Be Excited About Films On The Green

Free and open to the public. All films are in French with English subtitles.

Don’t miss music by DJs before the screenings!

PURPLE NOON

By René Clément

Starring Alain Delon, Maurice Ronet

LES TONTONS FLINGUEURS

By Georges Lautner

Starring Lino Ventura, Bernard Blier, Jean Lefebvre, Francis Blanche

BUFFET FROID

By Bertrand Blier

Starring Gérard Depardieu, Jean Carmet, Bernard Blier, Michel Serrault

THE WOMEN ON THE 6TH FLOOR

By Philippe Le Guay

Starring Fabrice Luchini

LA HAINE

By Mathieu Kassovitz

Starring Vincent Cassel, Hubert Koundé, Saïd Taghmaoui

THE MOUSTACHE

By Emmanuel Carrère

Starring Vincent Lindon, Mathieu Amalric

GRAND ILLUSION

By Jean Renoir

Starring Jean Gabin, Pierre Fresnay

LE MAGNIFIQUE

By Philippe de Broca

Starring Jean-Paul Belmondo

2 AUTUMNS, 3 WINTERS

By Sébastien Betbeder

Starring Vincent Macaigne, Bastien Bouillon

THE FRENCH MINISTER

By Bertrand Tavernier

Starring Raphaël Personnaz, Thierry Lhermitte, Niels Arestrup

Official Sponsors

BNP Paribas, Air France, TV5 Monde

Supporters

New York Observer, The Weinstein Company, Zady

Friends

Columbia Maison Française, The Criterion Collection, Francine LeFrak & Rick Friedberg, and Frederic C. Weiss
